application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description:
Details pursuant to the discharge of condition 7 (Falling Lane Site) (Demolition and Construction Logistics & Management Plan of planning permission ref.76795/APP/2023/2503 dated 14-09-2023 (Formal Description: Demolition of existing Yiewsley Library Building and the erection of a new residential building on the Yiewsley Library site (Falling Lane) and the erection of a new mixed use building on the former Yiewsley Swimming Pool site (Otterfield Road), with a replacement library at ground floor level, residential uses above and new pedestrian access off of the High Street. 
Detailed Description: Demolition of existing Yiewsley Library Building and the erection of a 5-storey residential building, comprising 50 dwellings, with 28 undercroft parking spaces (13 for residential and 15 for use by Rabbsfarm Primary School). The Otterfield Road site proposes the erection of a 5-storey building, comprising 45 dwellings, with 25 car parking spaces (23 for residential and 2 for library users)).
site_name: LAND AT YIEWSLEY LIBRARY & FORMER YIEWSLEY POOL FALLING LANE
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge (Falling Lane Site) only of condition 7 of the approved planning application 76795/APP/2023/2503 dated 02-09-2024. Further details relating to the Otterfield Road Site of the condition are required in order to fully discharge the condition.
